Name: White Iron Helm
Description: A sturdy iron helm with a pointed top and a hinged visor for protection in battle.

Name: Snowy Steel Helm
Description: A steel helm with a snowflake crest, imbued with extra defense to protect against foes.

Name: Frosty Plate Helm
Description: A plate helm with intricate frost patterns etched into the metal, perfect for a winter campaign.

Name: White Regal Crown
Description: A majestic crown adorned with precious gems and intricate engravings fit for a king.

Name: White Enchanted Crown
Description: An enchanted crown that glows with a soft white light, imbuing the wearer with magical protection.

Name: White Gold-Plated Crown
Description: A lavish crown adorned with gold plating and sparkling jewels, fit for a noble or wealthy merchant.

Name: Ivory Hat
Description: A stylish ivory hat with intricate embroidery and a feather accent.

Name: Luminous Hat
Description: A luminous hat that glows in the dark and provides magical defense.

Name: Silken Hat
Description: A soft and silky white hat that adds a touch of elegance to any outfit.

Name: Feathered Hat
Description: A simple yet stylish white hat adorned with a small feather.

Name: Frost Hat
Description: A frosty white hat that imbues the wearer with powerful magic.

Name: Luminous Headdress
Description: A dazzling headdress made of rare materials that radiates a powerful aura.

Name: Ethereal Headdress
Description: A delicate headdress that seems to glow with a soft light. Perfect for a noble lady.

Name: Regal Headdress
Description: An imposing headdress that exudes an aura of power and authority. Boosts defense.

Name: Celestial Headdress
Description: A divine headdress that protects the wearer from magical attacks. A true masterpiece.

Name: Majestic Headdress
Description: A grand headdress that grants the wearer additional vitality. Fit for a queen.

Name: Enchanted Headdress
Description: A mystical headdress that seems to be imbued with magical properties. A true wonder.
